title: Chocolate Granola
ingredients: ½ cup raw natural almond butter (or natural nut butter)
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the dry ingredients.
In another bowl, mix the wet ingredients until smooth
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix well until every oat is covered in the mixture.
Line a large baking tray with parchment paper.  Add the oat and spread them out in the pan.
Bake for 20-22 minutes total.  Stirring halfway through.
Once finished baking, place the granola on a cooling rack.
After 10 minutes sprinkle the chocolate chips.
source: SQuarantine Cooking - Homemade Chocolate Granola Cereal with Almond Butter - Fit Men Cook Baking powder biscuits
